name: Uncolored (pjdevs, Zaksley)
description:
Uncolored is a simple mini-game written in C/OpenGL.

In this game, you control an uncolored square. During each phase of the game you can move your square in the 4 directions, and new colored squares will spawn and move in a random direction. Tought, beware, if you stay too long time without moving, the shake will increase and get rid of you ! The quicker you play, the more the shake reduces. Survive a long as you can among dozens of colored squares with different behaviors and if you hit a colored square, you loose ! :D

Controls : Move with arrows

No songs or texts are present in the game but some updates could come soon ;-)

Linux & Mac precompiled versions also coming soon !

Sources of the project on Github at  https://github.com/pjdevs/uncolored.

Authors:

    • pjdevs
    • Zaksley
